sourcesContent:
import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { Clock, Flag, Paperclip } from "react-feather" import { formatDate } from "../utils/formatters" const TaskCard = ({ task }) => { // Status class mapping const statusClasses = { pending: "status-pending", "in-progress": "status-in-progress", completed: "status-completed", } // Priority class mapping const priorityClasses = { high: "priority-high", medium: "priority-medium", low: "priority-low", } // Format status for display const formatStatus = (status) => { return status .split("-") .map((word) => word.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + word.slice(1)) .join(" ") } return (

{task.title}

{formatStatus(task.status)}

{task.description}

{formatDate(task.dueDate)}
{task.priority.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + task.priority.slice(1)}
{task.documents && task.documents.length > 0 && (
{task.documents.length}
)}
Assigned to: {task.assignedTo.name}
) } export default TaskCard
